description: The name of the feature that can be enabled or disabled globally

enum.name: DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS
enum.description: Data access automatic reminders and revocation notifications

enum.name: DATA_ACCESS_AUTO_REVOCATION
enum.description: Data access automatic revocation of expired approvals

enum.name: MULTIPART_AUTO_CLEANUP
enum.description: Automatic cleanup of old multipart uploads

enum.name: DATA_DOWNLOAD_THROUGH_CLOUDFRONT
enum.description: Route downloads of Synapse Data through AWS CloudFront

enum.name: CHANGE_PASSWORD_2FA_CHECK_BYPASS
enum.description: Disable checking for two fa when changing the user password

enum.name: USE_NEW_ASYNC_GOOGLE_MULTIPART_UPLOAD
enum.description: Set to false to use the old Google multi-part upload dao.
